entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Campbell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Campbell River Airport 06:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: ESE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of freezing rain or ice pellets. High zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of ice pellets this morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 70 percent chance of freezing rain. Risk of freezing rain late this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
